reason.tex: \begin{align} \dfrac{x\cdot\sin x}{1-\cos x} &= \dfrac{x\cdot 2\sin\frac{x}{2}\cos\frac{x}{2}}{2\sin^2\frac{x}{2}} \\ &= \underbrace{\dfrac{2\frac{x}{2}\cdot\cos\frac{x}{2}}{\sin\frac{x}{2}} = \dfrac{2z\cdot\cos z}{\sin z}}_{z = \frac{x}{2}}\\ \therefore \lim_{x\to 0}\left( \dfrac{x\cdot\sin x}{1-\cos x} \right) &= \lim_{z\to 0}\dfrac{2z\cdot\cos z}{\sin z} \\ &= 2\lim_{z\to 0}\dfrac{\cos z}{\left(\dfrac{\sin z}{z}\right)} \\ &= 2\left[ \dfrac{\lim_{z\to 0}\cos z}{\lim_{z\to 0}\left( \dfrac{\sin z}{z}\right)}\right] = 2 \end{align}
